definition: A term commonly used to refer to a specific type of fruit tree, known for its round shape and the sweet, juicy fruit it produces. It is often associated with orchards and is frequently mentioned in discussions related to gardening, agriculture, and culinary recipes.

examples.german: Der Apfelkern ist der innere Teil des Apfels.
examples.english: The apple core is the inner part of the apple.

examples.german: Die Apfelkerne können zum Pflanzen neuer Apfelbäume verwendet werden.
examples.english: The apple seeds can be used to plant new apple trees.

examples.german: Die Apfelkerne enthalten giftige Stoffe, wenn sie in großen Mengen gegessen werden.
examples.english: Apple seeds contain toxic substances when eaten in large quantities.

examples.german: Die Apfelkerne werden oft entfernt, bevor der Apfel gegessen wird.
examples.english: The apple seeds are often removed before eating the apple.

examples.german: Die Apfelkerne können auch zur Herstellung von Apfelkernöl verwendet werden.
examples.english: Apple seeds can also be used to produce apple seed oil.
